snippet: AMSTERDAM--Edith Lehr, 91, Key West and Alexandria Bay, NY, formerly of Syracuse. Born in Bayonne, daughter of Martin and Rebecca Lehr. Graduate of Teaneck High School and Northwestern University. Owner of The Curry Mansion Inn, Key West. Predeceased by husband Albert, son Bruce, daughter Carol Amsterdam Fornari and sister Rachel Lehr. She is survived by her daughter Patsy, son Philip (Nancy), son-in-law Arthur Fornari, six grandchildren, one great-grandchild, brother Jay Lehr (Janet), brother-in-law Stanley Amsterdam (Judie) of West Orange. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  AMSTERDAM, EDITH LEHR
